quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you. – John Wooden
fact: Fictional/horror writer Stephen King sleeps with a nearby light on to calm his fear of the dark.
joke: There's not really any training for garbagemen. They just pick things up as they go.
